entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
